summary: This mod makes GarrusTheLoneWolf eso nord weapons abit darker i take no credit on the weapons or models that was all him i just edited them to look less shiny n new.
descriptionHtml:
To install
drop the files in eso nord weapons located in texture as seen below,if you do not have the folder dont panic just create it n it should wrk fine
The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim Legendary Edition\Data\textures\weapons\steel\eso nord weapons

I know i haven't edited the unbroken forgotten sword i will do that when i get my main pc back.


If you like this mod you should endorse GarrusTheLoneWolfÂ  eso weapon mod hes mod really is amazing.
author: GarrusTheLoneWolf
